attributes.action: Look at ways of helping young homeowners and professionals cut their dept and survive with monthly bills, without raising interest and tax.  As many people including professionals are struggling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a young single professional I find it increasingly hard to survive after the monthly bills have been taken from my wage.  I have had to self fund a recent post graduate qualification so I can make my way further up the career ladder, and give back to the community.  But with the repayments on the loan going up with interest rates, I’m sure like many young people we wonder is it worth it if we have to financially struggle? 

Please help get the Prime Minister to look at our plight otherwise I find it hard to think what our lives will be like in the future

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
